description: Update a project transport plan segment set
permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSetPolicy, delegated to the related project transport plan; user must have access to that project transport plan.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (project transport plan segment set ID). At least one field must be provided. --external-tms-leg-number and --trucker may be empty to clear. project_transport_plan relationship is create-only. segment_miles_sum is read-only. Trucker must belong to the same broker as the project transport plan.

flags.name: --external-tms-leg-number
flags.validation: Empty string clears the external TMS leg number.

flags.name: --trucker
flags.validation: Empty string clears the trucker assignment.
